```{r}
skill_data <- read_excel(path, sheet = "skills") %>%
  group_by(order) %>%
  arrange(order, .by_group = TRUE) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(skill = glue("* {skill}"))

categories <- c("programming_language", "tool", "technique", "language", "soft_skill")
formatted_skills <- map(categories, ~ filter_and_pull(skill_data, type, .x, skill))

code <- formatted_skills[[1]]
tools <- formatted_skills[[2]]
techniques <- formatted_skills[[3]]
languages <- formatted_skills[[4]]
soft_skills <- formatted_skills[[5]]
```
